description:
Initially, Jordan comes across as a "tough" guy. After all, he is a very solid, muscled, 6-foot-tall young man with a full-force, baseball-trained arm. But that persona quickly fades when he smiles and you start talking to him.
"How often do you work out?"
"Four days a week."
"Is this something you have always done? Or did you just start doing it recently?" I asked.
"Probably about last year... when I was in high school, I worked out a little bit with sports but nothing too much."
"Do you do personal training... do you have a personal trainer?"
"I just did it by myself, looked online and voilà!" he laughed.
title: Jordan
